sections.text:
81-2128.Condemnation or disconnection order; service.

A copy of each condemnation or disconnection order shall be served personally or by United States mail upon the property owner at his or her last-known address, the licensee making the installation, and such other persons as the board by rule or regulation may direct.

SourceLaws 1975, LB 525, ยง 28;Laws 1978, LB 833, ยง 12;R.S.Supp.,1980, ยง 81-598;Laws 1993, LB 193, ยง 25.
